name: The World of The Candy Girl
name_original: The World of The Candy Girl
description:
In a topdown perspective you control the candy girl, a young woman who loves candy.
You will enter a frantic battle against the Yballs, they are clay monsters, and
invaded the world to steal the candy.

Use your super powers and your rifle to destroy your enemies. You will be able to
use several different types of projectiles, shoot mercilessly.

You will face small, big and giant enemies, some of them will shoot you, others
will explode on you like a bomb. You will also encounter obstacles on the way,
such as cannons, birds, and many bombs. Be careful.
